Package uk.rib.armouryoftheguardian

Class WeaponPerk

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.rib.armouryoftheguardian.WeaponPerk
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable
    public class WeaponPerk
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    This sets the viewing of the end user's selected weapon's perks.

    Parcelable is used, and is an interface for class instances that can be written to, and restored from, a Parcel. For classes implementing the Parcelable interface, they must also have a non-null static field called CREATOR of a type that implements the Parcelable.Creator interface.

    Since:
    22.3

        public void writeToParcel​(android.os.Parcel dest,

        This flattens the end user's selected weapon's perk's icon and definition in to a Parcel.

        Parameters:
        dest - The Parcel in which the object should be written. This value cannot be null.
